main event: A bright light that appeared to be the ECHO II satellite was observed moving from north to south over Dayton, Ohio on March 18, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for 10 minutes.
The witness stated the object looked like the ECHO satellite.
The object was moving from north to south.
The sky was bright and cloudy at the time of the observation.
No photographs were taken of the object.
